code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> init

    init --> p_frm : open-paren / form-start
    init --> p_frm : close-paren / form-end
    init --> d_frm : open-brace / form-start
    init --> d_frm : close-brace / form-end
    init --> d_frm : open-bracket / form-start
    init --> d_frm : close-bracket / form-end
    init --> o_frm : other-char / form-start
    init --> init : ws-char / (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)

    p_frm --> p_frm : open-paren / form-start
    p_frm --> p_frm : close-paren / form-end
    p_frm --> p_frm : ws-char / (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    p_frm --> p_frm : open-brace / (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    p_frm --> p_frm : close-brace / (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    p_frm --> p_frm : open-bracket / (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    p_frm --> p_frm : close-bracket / (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    p_frm --> p_frm : other-char / (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)

    o_frm --> o_frm : open-paren / form-start
    o_frm --> o_frm : close-paren / form-end
    o_frm --> o_frm : ws-char / form-end
    o_frm --> o_frm : open-brace / (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    o_frm --> o_frm : close-brace / (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
    o_frm --> o_frm : open-bracket / (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    o_frm --> o_frm : close-bracket / (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    o_frm --> o_frm : other-char / (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)

    d_frm --> d_frm : open-brace / form-start
    d_frm --> d_frm : close-brace / form-end
    d_frm --> d_frm : open-bracket / form-start
    d_frm --> d_frm : close-bracket / form-end
    d_frm --> d_frm : open-paren / (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    d_frm --> d_frm : close-paren / (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    d_frm --> d_frm : ws-char / (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    d_frm --> d_frm : other-char / (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)

    error --> error : (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。
